publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2103 Mr Kenneth Macintosh: Celebration of Chanukahâ€”That the Parliament sends warm greetings to Jews throughout Scotland for the Festival of Chanukah; recognises the challenge of dedication represented by the Chanukah lights shining brightly for eight days, dedication to friends, dedication to society and dedication to freedom; further recognises that the Chanukah candles are a powerful symbol of light overcoming darkness, and, with that light, prays for a bright future for the world built on harmony, diversity and freedom. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson*, Michael McMahon*, Helen Eadie*, Chris Ballance*, Mike Pringle*, Mike Watson*, Bill Butler*
S2M-2103 Celebration of Chanukah (lodged on 2 December 2004) Murdo Fraser*, Murray Tosh*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Elaine Smith*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-2103 Celebration of Chanukah (lodged on 2 December 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-2103 Celebration of Chanukah (lodged on 2 December 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2103 Celebration of Chanukah (lodged on 2 December 2004) Robin Harper*
